sentences.sContent: Avoid strenuous exercise in the evening.
sentences.sCn: 应避免在傍晚进行剧烈的运动。

sentences.sContent: Strenuous efforts had been made to improve conditions in the jail.
sentences.sCn: 为改善那家监狱里的条件已做了艰苦的努力。

synos.tran: 紧张的；费力的；奋发的；艰苦的；热烈的

trans.tranOther: A strenuous activity or action involves a lot of energy or effort
